Package: sk.hax.software.os

[Java] Interface Terminal

    • sk.hax.software.os.Observable
    • All Superinterfaces:
      Observable

      Interface of a terminal input/output device. Extends observable to allow for subscribers to listen for incoming data from the terminal. Contains methods to write output to the terminal.

      Authors:
      mio

      • Methods Summary

          Methods 
          Type Name and description
          void publish(byte[] data)
          Output the specified data to the terminal.
          void write(byte[] data)
          Output the specified data to the terminal.
          void write(java.lang.String text)
          Write the specified string to the terminal.
          void writeln(java.lang.String text)
          Write the specified string to the terminal, followed by a newline character sequence.
          void writeln()
          Write a newline character sequence to the terminal.
